Package GUIElements

Class HTMLDocument

java.lang.Object
GUIElements.GUIElement
GUIElements.Container
GUIElements.Pane
GUIElements.LeafPane
GUIElements.HTMLDocument
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScrollBarListener
public class HTMLDocument
extends LeafPane
Container type class used as a pane. It keeps track of the loaded URL and the loaded HTML code. It also implements everything needed for splitting.

  • Constructor Details

    • HTMLDocument

      public HTMLDocument​(int x, int y, int w, int h, java.lang.String url, java.lang.String HTMLCode)
      Constructor of the HTMLDocument class. It extends the Pane class.
      Parameters:
      x - - x coordinate of this HTMLDocument
      y - - y coordinate of this HTMLDocument
      w - - width of this HTMLDocument
      h - - height of this HTMLDocument
      url - - URL of the loaded page
      HTMLCode - - string which contains the HTML code of the loaded page

    • paint

      public void paint​(java.awt.Graphics g)
